TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit LoggerExtensions extends System.Object
public ref class LoggerExtensions abstract sealed

Docs.summary: ILogger extension methods for common scenarios.

Docs.param: The to create the scope in.

Docs.summary: Formats the message and creates a scope.
Docs.returns: A disposable scope object. Can be null.
